snippet: Activision, maker of the World of Warcraft video game, said the layoffs would not come from its game development department.
abstract: Activision Blizzard, maker of the World of Warcraft video game, is cutting 600 jobs globally; says layoffs will not come from its game development department.
lead_paragraph: Activision, maker of the World of Warcraft video game, said the layoffs would not come from its game development department.

headline.seo: Activision Cuts 600 Jobs as Users Defect to Online Games
